channel.title: [request] HARDEST THING TO DO
channel.description:
i wanna make a spell called CLONE i want it to work on anything like exapmple
you click on clone then a tree it clones a tree beside you you click on clone then a person is clones that persona nd his items and the clone follows and helps you you click on npc same thing as above...
HARDEST THING i tryed and failed miserbly i dont know what to do help

XD… see thats nto waht i want

item.title: [request] HARDEST THING TO DO
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

It acutully isn’t very hard.

First click object will be a pain in the ass, or just use

[code]public int playerObject = -1;

if (objectID > 1 && < 500) {
playerObject = objectID
player.setnpc = objectID
isObject = true;
}[/code]

It won’t work, but you get the jist

Read full topic
